name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Django** to create high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My expertise in **Next.js** and API development allows me to build scalable and maintainable applications, while my strong problem-solving, critical-thinking, and attention to detail skills ensure optimal delivery of software projects. I am well-versed in Agile methodologies, enhancing team collaboration and project efficiency.

I possess a comprehensive understanding of cloud services, having worked extensively with **Azure** and **AWS**. My experience includes leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms, leveraging **observability** tools to monitor application performance. I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust and compliant applications aligned with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Moreover, I bring hands-on experience in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:

Applied **APIs** for seamless integration between front-end and back-end services, enhancing application observability and performance.
Executed Agile methodologies to coordinate development workflow, including sprint planning and iterative releases, improving overall project delivery times by **20%**.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills to troubleshoot complex system issues, achieving resolution within **48 hours** on average and contributing to improved application stability.
Conducted thorough code reviews with a focus on attention to detail, resulting in a reduction of bugs by **30%** in production releases.
Developed web services that effectively communicate with databases using **Django REST Framework**, optimizing round-trip times and bolstering user experience.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to refine application interfaces for enhanced user engagement and satisfaction metrics - achieving an increase in user retention of **15%**.
Implemented observability and monitoring solutions to enhance system reliability, leading to a **25%** decrease in system downtime.
Engaged in regular brainstorming sessions with cross-functional teams to ideate and implement new features, improving application functionality and user base.
Leveraged modern developer tools and best practices to maintain high-quality code standards and foster a culture of technical excellence within the team.

Utilized **React** (18) and **TypeScript** to develop dynamic, responsive frontend applications, ensuring seamless user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.

Implemented APIs to facilitate communication between frontend and backend, enhancing data flow and user interface performance by reducing load time by **30%**.

Exercised strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills to analyze system performance and implement effective solutions that improved response times by **25%**.
Adopted a meticulous attention to detail when building responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js** and HTML5/CSS3 to ensure compliance with **WCAG 2.1** accessibility guidelines.
Engaged in regular code reviews and collaborative discussions to foster a high-quality codebase, mentoring junior developers and promoting best practices in software development.
Contributed to architectural decisions and strategic planning that improved overall application sustainability and performance across the tech stack.
